message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% while I take 60% considering the money loses value for me in the next round.
I think this is a fairer split considering the inflation we're facing. You still get more than you would have in the next round, and it gives me a little more to work with. Let's end this game now.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's more than what I would get if I accepted yours and waited a round to propose.  Let's wrap this up.
